thread.title_full: Hearses not to be used for protests, says Selangor Sultan - Nation | The Star Online

title: Hearses not to be used for protests, says Selangor Sultan - Nation | The Star Online
text:
Thursday, 23 February 2017 | MYT 1:17 PM Hearses not to be used for protests, says Selangor Sultan 
(pic) has hit out at the misuse of the state’s hearses for demonstrations. 
’s private secretary Datuk Mohamad Munir Bani said the Sultan has reminded all parties in charge of managing hearses in Selangor to look after the vehicles and make sure they are only used for funerals. 
His Royal Highness does not want the hearses to be misused for any other purposes, such being rented out for demonstrations, or for any other use, which has nothing to do with the management of funerals,” it said. 
. 
Such actions will only create the impression that Muslims are mocking the use of hearses,” the statement by Mohamad Munir said. 
’s act had tarnished the sanctity of the institution of mosques, adding that religious officials were manipulated by irresponsible people to allow hearses to be used in the demonstration. 
’s demonstration.
